extendedInfo.description: The Leader's e-Book application is intended to help both the individual Soldier and the unit leader manage the data that is typically kept in a physical (green) leaderâs notebook. It provides you, as the leader, instant access to the most frequently used information about your Soldiers. It will also allow you, as an individual Soldier, to track your own personal information. This application leverages the capabilities of your phone such as camera, GPS, real-time mapping and directions, as well as the phone itself. Some of the information you can store and keep at your fingertips (with additional items added in future releases) includes:â¢	Contact informationâ¢	Names and birth dates of children and spousesâ¢	Anniversary datesâ¢	Scores and dates of various types of qualifications and tests (such as weapons and physical fitness)â¢	Links to various online reference publications and military awardsâ¢	Sample checklists and report formatsâ¢	Risk management assessmentâ¢	Daily Personnel Status Reportsâ¢	Your military awardsâ¢	Sizes for various uniform items and equipmentWe hope you can use this application to help you better manage your personal career and, as a leader, become more effective by allowing you to focus more on caring for, and leading, your Soldiers and less on having to update hard-copy information.Thanks to everyone for your great feedback and suggestions!

reviews.title: Awesome app for NCOs
reviews.comment: Has everything you need but needs a few updates. Need more FMs, a few regulations are out dated, and need to be able to have option to add stars, oak leaf, etc for ribbons. Other then that, great app. Worth the amount.
reviews.author: Rem Rodrick

reviews.title: Art
reviews.comment: would like to see file transfer/share for those NCO\'s who are squadleaders and platoon sergeants as it is a leader book to track soldiers.
reviews.author: Art Ledesma

reviews.title: Must have
reviews.comment: Very good app! Recommending it to my squad leaders.
reviews.author: Joe Cordova

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great app and very useful for NCO\'s. Would ne nice to have a section for tracking status for soldiers MedPros that include next date of all MedPros. Also would be nice to have a section that tracks soldiers issues and promotion points.
reviews.author: Jessica Hill

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: This app was encouraged by my brigade csm. I see why.  The only improvement I would like to see is a courses tracker. I\'m in Germany now and our unit makes us do these annual online classes. A way to keep track of these would be nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Online updatable?
reviews.comment: This app is already an outstanding tool, but if I were able to look at the information from my phone on a computer via USB, it would be almost enough to replace my binder. It takes a lot longer to type with one finger as opposed to a full size keyboard. +1 for the other comments about exporting to PDF or XFDL forms as I would like to see that capability as well. Great as a quick reference tool for the modern leader!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Would like to be able to put the soldiers equipment(weapons, cco, acog,  assigned vehicle, NVG, serial numbers) in there profile, also a picture of the soldier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice. Not nearly as good as the iPad app
reviews.comment: The ipad one can take pictures for the soldier profile and looks way better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Phenominal
reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting for this app for ever. It is absolutely the handiest app to have for leader. It\'s great being able to reference it at any time and be able to have accurate data instantly on hand for briefings and updates. This is truly where the army and technology integration is headed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need to be able to put pictures with Soldiers!
reviews.comment: Good but one thing missing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Raaa671
reviews.comment: This would be better if you can add pictures to the soldiers profiles.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: Can u make it users friendly like the apple version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good app
reviews.comment: Four stars because it needs some improvements.  Needs vehicle information and emergency contact information.  Needs to be able to auto fill forms (automatically put the Soldiers name in a counseling form).  Be able to print data and send it either by email and or text.  Also you should be able to import files such as a Soldiers ERB and last NCOER, PT and weapons cards.  Right now this app is more of a quick reference you still need the paper copy of your leadersbook to have all information needed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: I agree with everybody else\'s comments about implementing improvements.  I also think the option when you pull up a form, being able to select a SM\'s name (drop down box option) on that form I.e. DA Form 4856, then that SM\'s information is pre-loaded in that form would be pretty cool.  That would be a huge time saver and allow us as Leaders to focus more on training Soldiers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dman
reviews.comment: Its amazing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Convenient app, works well and handy to have all the info.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good way to keep a portable leaders book.
reviews.comment: The team has worked with me when I brought up the idea for this to be downloadable onto a tablet.  I am so happy with the customer service that this team had to keep working with me. As a platoon sergeant, having this on my app will make this so much easier to read then trying to read it on my phone.  Additionally it makes it so much easier than carrying around the typical large three ring binder leaders book.Still waiting for the app to be able to export to CVS or PDF format.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ray
reviews.comment: Great app, only down fall is that you can\'t add awards from other branches.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful app
reviews.comment: I would like to see a calender portion that you can update with short and long range calender events
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful...
reviews.comment: On my phone. However completely incompatible with my new Nexus 7 tablet. Would be outstanding if it was. Been using this app since its arrival in the play store. 5 stars for Nexus 7 compatibility.
reviews.author: A Google User
